msbt.message: Ugh, now that I've started thinking about the Turkey Day festivities, I can NOT stop, !You know we're getting a celebrity chef, right? Just looking at him makes my mouth waterEw. I'm like that drools when it hears a bell. As if!
It's almost time Ooh, I love Turkey Day so much! Are you ready, ?Me?<10_4 /> I'm always ready. Let's start it right now! C'mon, I dare everyone on !

It's almost turkey time on Turkey Day! I'm mega excited for all of the festivities, .I'm going to make something soooo delish, just you wait.Making food is like making a songâ€” you need a little spice, sugarand elite choreography, duh!
